metadata.title: CVE-2024-9403 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 130. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 131 and Thunderbird < 131.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
